title: kAruNya mUrutiye
sahitya:
kAruNya mUrutiye kangaLu mUruLLa doreye


anupallavi

  dhAriNiyoLu ninageNeyE gurudEva doreye


caraNam 1    guhAsura mardanane dEva khaga vruSa vAhanane gaja carma pItAmbarane mahAdEva mAdhavanE
    caraNam 2    tripurAvaLi samhArane trailOkya pAvanane apAra mahimane prasanna shrI hariharane
    caraNam 3    tungabhadraDiya tALipape gangeya oDeya purandara viTTalana priya nI salahayya ennoDeya
